name: LAND TRUST ALLIANCE
sampleDescriptions: Legislative services related to tax reform and issues affecting the tax deduction for donations of conservation easements, including H.R. 4459 and S.2436, Charitable Conservation Easement Program Integrity Act, and IRS Notices 2017-10, 2017-29 and Notice 2017-58.

Legislative services related to tax reform and issues affecting the tax deduction for donations of conservation easements, including H.R. 1992, Bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to limit the amount of certain qualified conservation contributions, S. 170, Charitable Conservation Easement Program Integrity Act of 2019, and IRS Notices 2017-10, 2017-29 and Notice 2017-58.

Legislative services related to tax reform and issues affecting the tax deduction for donations of conservation easements, including H.R. 1992, Bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to limit the amount of certain qualified conservation contributions, S. 170, Charitable Conservation Easement Program Integrity Act of 2019, IRS Notices 2017-10, 2017-29 and Notice 2017-58, and S. 4751, Charitable Conservation Easement Program Integrity Act.
